title: Rajesh Nambiar quits Cognizant, appointed as Nasscom president designate
description: Debjani Ghosh, who finishes her term in November, said on X that she is "thrilled to welcome Nambiar" to the industry body. "Rajesh, a dear friend, colleague, is an exceptional leader, and with him at the helm of nasscom, I know that this organization I hold so dear is in very safe hands," her post read.
content: Indiaâ€™s technology industry body Nasscom on Wednesday announced the appointment of Rajesh Nambiar as its president designate, succeeding Debjani Ghosh who completes her term in November 2024. Nambiar was elected as chairperson of Nasscom in 2023.He will leave global technology major Cognizant, where he is currently India chair, at the end of September.
